tns:patch.author: cdolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_sub_sub_sectors; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_sub_sub_sectors AS SELECT sa.amp_activity_id, rs.name AS sectorname, rs.amp_sector_id AS amp_sector_id, sum(sa.sector_percentage) AS sector_percentage FROM amp_activity_sector sa JOIN all_sectors_with_levels aswl ON sa.amp_sector_id = aswl.amp_sector_id JOIN amp_sector rs ON rs.amp_sector_id = aswl.id2 JOIN amp_classification_config acc ON acc.id = sa.classification_config_id WHERE acc.name = 'Primary' GROUP BY sa.amp_activity_id, rs.amp_sector_id ORDER BY sa.amp_activity_id;
